name: Let There Be Chaos (thornclaw1)
description:
Must Be Played In Full Screen

--Controls--

WASD to move

Shift or Right Mouse to dash

E or Space to turn invincible

Left Mouse to shoot

--Instructions--

The more enemies there are, the higher your score multiplier. Keep the enemies around because they just want to help. That's all! Have fun!

There is no music or sound effects cause I ran out of time.. ;^^

Here's some epic music you can listen to while you play instead.  https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLEwzEeiResJDcFs1kgo1ApINLoYtnmjyj

Hope you have fun anyways!
